FuncDef: This command configures the number of consecutively sent ICMP echo request messages that must fail before the host unreachable priority control event is set.

ParaDef.Info: The number of ICMP echo request message attempts that must fail for the event to enter the set state. It also defines the threshold so a lower consecutive number of failures can clear the event state. Values-1 to 60.

ExtraInfo: Default: drop-count 3 - 3 consecutive ICMP echo request failures are required before the host unreachable priority control event is set.
